Text.Page:
Our camp's primary function is to act as a staging area for incoming troops. We assign them to units in greatest need and get them onto the line against Thulsa's legions. Unfortunately, we're in danger ourselves.

The {@LinkCreature:27#23#Thulsan threshers}, {@LinkCreature:27#25#Thulsan reapers} and {@LinkCreature:27#21#Thulsan battleragers} are slaughtering our forces. You're ordered to slay them and buy us time.
Not bad, <PCNAME>. Not efficient, but effective enough. I would have done better, of course.
